txt.en: 'I would sooner tell you of it than go there myself, save at the King's command. It is called the Haunted Mountain, and it is said that Dead Men of ancient times live there still, crying out for vengeance upon those who still draw the breath of the living. None can pass that way.\n\n'A dead man could walk the paths beneath the mountain and come out into the moonlight of the Blackroot Vale, in Gondor. But that is said only by fools or braggarts, and not by honest folk.'
